nodes.text: The cavitation hyperdrive was a type of hyperdrive.

The Mon Calamari mathematician Q-Viza was credited with its invention and it was used by the Calamari to allow them to establish colonies on Ruisto, Mantan and Hinakuu between 4400 BBY and 4200 BBY. However, it was exponentially slower than the standard Corellian hyperdrive, which limited the territorial expansion of the Mon Calamari.
